long_description: Go beyond the Boundary Waters and discover 85 rivers in Southern Minnesota that offer plenty of scenery and diverse paddling conditions. Authors: Lynne and Robert Diebel. Softcover: 198 pages; black-and-white maps; black-and-white photographs. Trail Books; copyright 2007. Trip descriptions highlight scenery and points of interest. Detailed maps feature put-ins and take-outs, rapids, campsites, roads, dams and more. Book also offers valuable information on gradients, water levels, safety, shuttle routes and boat rentals.
short_description: Go beyond the Boundary Waters and discover 85 rivers in Southern Minnesota that offer plenty of scenery and diverse paddling conditions.
